SCTX - Script Source:
Scn fbmwKarrodScript

short doOnce
short kingOnce
short OnPCHitMe
short guardOnce
short ModOnce

begin gamemode

	if ( fbmwTRChampion.KingHit > 0 )
		if ( kingOnce == 0 )
			StartCombat Player
			set kingOnce to -1
			return
		endif
	endif

	if ( fbmwTRChampion.KarrodFightStart < 2 )
		if ( OnPCHitMe == 1 )
			if ( GetAV Health < 634 )
				SetAV Health 634
				if ( guardOnce == 0 )
					if ( GetStage fbmwTRChampion == 20 )
						set guardOnce to -1
					elseif ( fbmwTRChampion.KarrodFightStart == 1 )
						set guardOnce to -1
					endif
				endif
				if ( guardOnce == -1 )
					Set fbmwTRChampion.CheapShot to 1
					fbmwTRKarrodGuardREF.moveto Player, 1, 128, 0
					fbmwTRKarrodGuardREF.Enable
					StopCombat Player
					Setav aggression 30
					set guardOnce to 0
				endif
			endif
			Set OnPCHitMe to 0
		endif
	endif

	if ( ModOnce == 0 )
		if ( fbmwTRChampion.KarrodFightStart > 1 )
			Setav aggression 30
			Set ModOnce to -1
		endif
	endif

;this stops the fight and forces the Karrod greeting

	if ( GetStage fbmwTRChampion >= 70 )
		if ( fbmwTRChampion.KarrodBeaten == 0 )
			if ( GetAV Health <= 100 )
				if ( GetAV Health < 1 )
;MessageBox "REVIVING KARROD. IS HE DEAD????"
					resurrect 1
					ModAV Health 500
				endif
				if ( fbmwTRChampion.KarrodBeaten == 0 )
					Set fbmwTRChampion.KarrodBeaten to 1
					DisablePlayerControls
					StopCombat Player
					SetAV Aggression 5
					ModDisposition Player 90
					ModAV Health 100
					ModAV Fatigue 100
					fbmwIranoREF.StopLook
					fbmwOthrelothREF.StopLook
					fbmwTienusREF.StopLook
					fbmwKingHelsethREF.StopLook
					fbmwGratusREF.StopLook
					fbmwFaranoREF.StopLook
					StartConversation Player
				endif
			endif
		endif
	endif

;this section lowers his stats if you've bribed ra'tesh

	if ( fbmwTRChampion.karrodBribe == 0 )
		return
	endif

	if ( fbmwTRChampion.karrodBribe == 1 )
		if ( doOnce == 0 )
			ModAV Blade -20
			ModAV Block -20
			ModAV HeavyArmor -20
			ModAV Strength -40
			ModAV Speed -30
			if ( GetAV Health > 100 )
				ModAV Health -100
			endif
			if ( GetAV Fatigue > 100 )
				ModAV Fatigue -100
			endif
			RemoveSpell 0regenerateSXabilityX
			Set doOnce to 1
		endif
	endif


;this brings them back up after the fight

	if ( doOnce == 1 )
		if ( fbmwTRChampion.karrodBribe == 1 )
			if ( fbmwTRChampion.KarrodBeaten > 0 )
				SetAV Aggression 50
				ModDisposition Player 90
				ModAV Blade 20
				ModAV Block 20
				ModAV HeavyArmor 20
				ModAV Strength 40
				ModAV Speed 30
				SetAV Health 634
				SetAV Fatigue 631
				AddSpell 0regenerateSXabilityX
				set doOnce to 2
			endif
		endif
	endif
end

Begin OnHit
	set OnPCHitMe to 1
end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 2657 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
